## hpr2580 :: Diabetes

 For the last 15 years or so Diabetes has been a central fact in my life, and I needed to learn what to do about it. I think I discovered a way I can live with it and still have a good quality of life

https://www.webmd.com/diabetes/default.htm
https://www.aao.org/eye-health/diseases/what-is-diabetic-retinopathy
https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/diabetic-neuropathy/symptoms-causes/syc-20371580
https://www.webmd.com/diabetes/tc/diabetic-nephropathy-topic-overview#1
https://www.diabetes-book.com/
https://www.palain.com/?page_id=338
